title: To establish a new quality assessment method based on the regulation of intestinal microbiota in type 2 diabetes by lignans of Schisandra chinensis (Turcz.) Baill.
abstract: The mature fruit of Schisandra chinensis, a traditional Chinese medicinal herb, is primarily utilized for the management of diabetes. Its principal bioactive constituents include lignans, polysaccharides, and organic acids. Nonetheless, a standardized quality control methodology grounded in the therapeutic efficacy of Schisandra chinensis (Turcz.) Baill. for diabetes treatment has yet to be developed.
